alert.note: Alert for Gallia; Jackson; Vinton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 2:28PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Gallia, central Jackson and south central Vinton Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 228 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jackson, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Wellston, Oak Hill, Gallia, Coalton, Vinton, and Centerpoint. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
